data: PLASURG Breast Reconstruction: Implant - Post Operative (Multiphase)
Nurse to Initiate Surgeon Immediate Post Operative phase. These orders continue on the Inpatient Unit
Discontinue PLASURG Pre Operative (Day of Surgery) PowerPlan
Measure Drain Output and Notify Surgeon if drainage greater than 200 mL in 4 hours
Q4h and PRN for the first 24 hours post op
Site: Breast and axilla, Assess breast and axilla for bleeding, swelling and bruising q4h
Site: Breast, Apply two 6 inch tensor bandages around breast dressing
Site: Breast, Apply supportive surgical bra
QID, Apply covered ice pack over the surgical site
To order Sequential Compression Devices select the Venous Thromboembolism (VTE) Prophylaxis (Module)

ceFAZolin can be safely administered to patients with penicillin allergy, including anaphylaxis. Do NOT administer if severe delayed skin reaction to any beta-lactam (e.g. drug reaction with eosinophilia and systemic symptoms, Stevens-Johnson syndrome, toxic epidermal necrolysis)
1,000 mg, IV, q8h, order duration: 24 hour, drug form: bag
1000 mg, IV, q12h, order duration: 24 hour
